description:
For Army Reserve Soldier Michael Cross, the world as he knew it ended in an instant. One minute, he's in college, and in the next, rioters are roaming the highway around him, breaking into cars, and literally tearing people apart. This is the day the dead walk. This is the world of We're Alive.
We’re Alive is an ongoing series, packing performances and sound effects that rival movies and prove that modern audio drama is undead and well. Join our survivors as they band together, struggle to fortify a safe haven known as the Tower, and discovers that zombies are far from the worst thing in a post-apocalyptic Los Angeles where the rules of human decency no longer apply.
We premiere 3 New episodes a month, with a week off between chapters.
Little food. Little water. Little hope. Who is lucky enough to say "We're Alive?"
title: We're Alive - A "Zombie" Story of Survival

episodes.title: We're Alive: Goldrush - Chapter 10 - My best friend, the end
episodes.description:
The denouement. The final Chapter. With the Atlas in the dust, the soldiers regroup to find their path again. Things have become clearer on the surface, and everyone can breathe for the first time. As our heroes attempt to ride off into the sunset towards home, the gold calls in the distance...

Set 17 years after the main events of WE’RE ALIVE, GOLDRUSH is a recollection story that describes the efforts of the “soldiers” (Greg Muldoon, Anthony Robbins, Carl Thomas, and Samuel Puck) attempt a side mission to retrieve a suspected stash of gold bullion.

Told from the perspective of an aging Gen. Puck, he confides this previously undisclosed tale to the only surviving relation of his former team, Alex Robbins, the son of Puck’s friend Anthony. Over the course of ten episodes, the show will not only relate past tales of heroics, horror, and humor, but also sets the stage for future characters.

In Goldrush, fans will truly get to know these well-beloved characters characters on a much more emotionally satisfying level. Their humor and unique group dynamic certainly remain intact, and modeled after old Spaghetti Westerns, the story takes directions the series has not yet explored.

Filled with action, battles with the undead, love triangles, conflicting loyalties, and of course gold, WE’RE ALIVE: GOLDRUSH stands out as a truly unique Theater for the Mind experience for both new and old listeners.

SimpliSafe = Protect your home today at SimpliSafe.com/GOLDRUSH

UpStart = Visit Upstart.com/ALIVE

BetDSI = Go to BetDSI.com and use promo code ALIVE101

episodes.title: We’re Alive: Behind the Mic
episodes.description: We go behind the series in this in-depth look behind the mics and talk to show creator, Kc Wayland, about Goldrush and what goes into making this level of “Theater for the Mind”. This audio-doc includes exclusive interviews with cast, crew, and fans of the series, commemorating Oct 30th - #AudioDramaDay . Audio-Doc by Tim Mulhern

episodes.title: We're Alive: Goldrush - Chapter 9 - El Chupacabra
episodes.description:
The Atlas doesn’t feel much like home anymore. The world underground grows darker as a new terror has made its way beneath the surface. Legend has it that a green goat sucker named El Chupacabra will take your soul for an entire evening, only to return it safely the next day. Will the soldiers tempt fate by welcoming such an unholy beast?

Set 17 years after the main events of WE’RE ALIVE, GOLDRUSH is a recollection story that describes the efforts of the “soldiers” (Greg Muldoon, Anthony Robbins, Carl Thomas, and Samuel Puck) attempt a side mission to retrieve a suspected stash of gold bullion.

Filled with action, battles with the undead, love triangles, conflicting loyalties, and of course gold, WE’RE ALIVE: GOLDRUSH stands out as a truly unique Theater for the Mind experience for both new and old listeners.

episodes.title: We're Alive: Goldrush - Chapter 8 - Joyride
episodes.description:
A midnight joyride revs up conflict with the occupants of The Atlas, as issues of trust start to spread beneath the surface. Secrets start to seep out as the soldiers struggle to maintain control, and the future of the Gold becomes more gray.

episodes.title: We're Alive: Goldrush - Chapter 7 - The Last Day
episodes.description:
The rules of the Atlas are established forcing the soldiers to weigh what is truly valuable in their world. Life underground has a multitude of benefits, but the costs run deep as the dwellers beneath the eartch come clean about their struggles. A simple game between friends tests the strength of their bonds.

Set 17 years after the main events of WE’RE ALIVE, GOLDRUSH is a recollection story that describes the efforts of the “soldiers” (Greg Muldoon, Anthony Robbins, Carl Thomas, and Samuel Puck) attempt a side mission to retrieve a suspected stash of gold bullion.

episodes.title: We're Alive: Goldrush - Chapter 6 - Multi-Chambered
episodes.description:
Alex and Puck arrive at “Lake Matthews” a forward operating base, listening to the tapes left behind by his mother, taking them deeper into the history and network of “The Atlas”. The soldiers meet their match beneath the surface of the earth. As everyone becomes entangled with other temptations, unsuspected dangers still loom from a distance.

episodes.description:

episodes.title: We're Alive: Goldrush - Chapter 4 - The Ride of 'Inglorious Bastard'
episodes.description: Alex is taken further down the trail in the steps of his father, as Puck divulges the first leg of their Gold-Hunt. Permission, supplies, and a helicopter are the last three pieces to the puzzle, but the infected prove to complicate the plan as a stranger on the horizon stands by with his mechanical beast.

episodes.title: We’re Alive: Goldrush - Chapter 3 - Dusty Trails
episodes.description:
The party lives on! There is hope on the horizon as the pieces of the mission start to come together during the events of the extravagant birthday celebration. A card game puts everything on the line between some new and old friends, along with a local musical vaudevillian show to entertain the colonists, all the while the GOLD looms on the horizon.

Set 17 years after the main events of WE’RE ALIVE, GOLDRUSH is a recollection story that describes the efforts of the “soldiers” (Greg Muldoon, Anthony Robbins, Carl Thomas, and Samuel Puck) attempt a side mission to retrieve a suspected stash of gold bullion.

episodes.title: We’re Alive: Goldrush - Chapter 2 - Bushwacker
episodes.description:
The soldiers continue their investigation into the mysterious signal from the outpost. After returning home, the colony has come to life to celebrate a cherished locals’ 33rd birthday with a western-themed party. During the excitement, Carl continues to hunt for clues for the location of the gold.

episodes.title: We’re Alive: Goldrush - Chapter 1 - On the Road Again
episodes.description:
Chapter 1: We ride again! We’re Alive has returned with it’s new season/series Goldrush. This 10-part epic will take you places we have never gone before.

Set 17 years after the main events of WE’RE ALIVE, GOLDRUSH is a recollection story that describes the efforts of the “soldiers” (Greg Muldoon, Anthony Robbins, Carl Thomas, and Samuel Puck) as they attempt a side mission to retrieve a suspected stash of gold bullion.

As an aging General Puck confides this previously undisclosed tale to Alex Robbins, the son of his former teammate and friend, Anthony Robbins. Over the course of ten Chapters, Goldrush will not only relate past tales of heroics, horror, and humor, but also sets the stage for future events and characters.

Warning! These episodes contain loud sounds and adult situations, listener discretion is advised.Brought to you by Wayland Productions and PodcastOne.

episodes.title: We’re Alive Goldrush Premieres Tuesday September 10th
episodes.description:
We’re Alive launches a new, 10-episode season entitled “Goldrush” on Tuesday September 10th, 2019 online, with a live event release of the season premiere on September 7th 2019 at the Assistance League Theater in Los Angeles. Debuting its 6th season, We’re Alive began back in 2009 and has been downloaded over 160 million times worldwide.

Written, directed and produced by Kc Wayland, Goldrush dives back into the series with an adventure that spans the time of the series. Four soldiers (Puck, Muldoon, Robbins, and Carl) stumble across clues to a hidden gold heist stash. Since gold retains value even after the apocalypse, they plot to track down the prize for themselves. The “goldrush” is a fever of greed, that could ultimately consume and destroy them. The values of camaraderie and companionship are tested as they embark on a secret adventure to become ultra-rich in this spaghetti-western tale of humor, horror and heartbreak. Wayland Productions has partnered with Podcast One to release the series, starring Anthony Reyes, Shaun Lewin, Brett Newton, Christian Vieira, Brenna Otts, Erin Breen, Christy Carlson Romano (Kim Possible, Even Stevens), and guest starring Danny Trejo. And will release on the following schedule:

10 September 2019 – 7 AM PST Chapter 1

17 September 2019 – 7 AM PST Chapter 2

18 September 2019 – 7 AM PST Chapter 3

24 September 2019 – 7 AM PST Chapter 4

1 Oct 2019 – 7 AM PST Chapter 5

8 Oct 2019 – 7 AM PST Chapter 6

15 Oct 2019 – 7 AM PST Chapter 7

22 Oct 2019 – 7 AM PST Chapter 8

29 Oct 2019 – 7 AM PST Chapter 9

30 Oct 2019 – 7 AM PST Behind the Mic – Audio Documentary

5 Nov 2019 – 7 AM PST Chapter 10

For tickets and more information on the release, visit our website: www.werealive.com

episodes.title: We’re Alive: Goldrush Trailer
episodes.description: Coming this September the adventure continues with We’re Alive: Goldrush! Join Puck, Robbins, Muldoon and Carl as they embark on a quest to recover a Gold fortune stolen after the fall of man. Join us on September 7th as we premiere LIVE in Los Angeles, more details at www.werealive.com

episodes.title: We’re Alive Series Recap
episodes.description: Our next installment of the series, We’re Alive: Goldrush premieres September 2019!  Catch up on the series with this special recap that covers everything you need to know before we embark on our next journey. SPOILERS!

episodes.description: We're Alive has reached 50 million downloads! To commemorate the occasion, here's a sneak peak at the upcoming continuations in the series. Be sure to check out the website www.werealive.com to see our web store re-opening with a brand new special poster!

episodes.title: We're Alive: Lockdown - Part 6 of 6 - The Finale
episodes.description:
The finale for Lockdown is here! Stay tuned for more content from Wayland Productions, including our next mini-series "We're Alive: Goldrush"!
For updates on new episodes, follow us on social media, and join in on the discussion at http://www.werealive.com

episodes.title: We're Alive: Lockdown - Part 5 of 6
episodes.description: The Lockdown CONCLUDES!!! Join us for the live video broadcast, streaming finale of Lockdown part 6: June 3rd LIVE starting at 6 pm PST on www.werealive.com . The finale will then debut on the podcast feed June 6th, 9am PST. So if you want to experience the finale with the rest of the fans, join in on the finale stream on Friday June 3rd! Have an idea on how it will all end? Join in on the discussion at http://www.werealive.com/forum/

episodes.title: We're Alive: Lockdown - Part 1 of 6
episodes.description: We're Alive is BACK with Lockdown. Join us on this 6 part mini-series as we dive deep into Twin Towers Jail, and follow a small group of unlikely survivors as they struggle to find their way out. New episode weekly, Part 2 airs May 2nd!

episodes.title: Chapter 48 - The Ink Runs Dry - Series Finale
episodes.description:
Chapter 48 - "The Ink Runs Dry"
The end...
This is it! The final episode of We're Alive - A Story of Survival. Stay tuned on our website for our next series from Wayland Productions and our upcoming short side-episodes called "Tales from We're Alive" which will further explore the untold stories of survival. Be sure to follow us on Facebook and twitter to keep up to date on all the new happenings!

episodes.title: Chapter 18 - No Place Like Home - Part 2 of 3

Michael, Pegs and Kelly continue on their trail.

episodes.title: Chapter 18 - No Place Like Home - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 18 - "No Place Like Home" Part 1
Angel and Kalani plan their escape while Michael, Pegs and Kelly follow a trail further south.

episodes.title: Chapter 17 - There Might Be Others - Part 3 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 17 - "There Might Be Others" Part 3
Both sets of survivors find shelter from the dangers outside.
Come back Monday January 24th for Chapter 18

episodes.title: Chapter 17 - There Might Be Others - Part 2 of 3
episodes.description:

episodes.title: Chapter 17 - There Might Be Others - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 17 - "There Might Be Others" Part 1
You never know what's just around the corner...
Come back Monday January 3rd for Part 2

episodes.description:
Chapter 16 - "Over the Air-Waves" Part 3
Michael and Pegs are Trapped while Angel and Kalani drop off a special package.
Come back Monday December 20th for Chapter 17

episodes.title: Chapter 16 - Over the Air-Waves - Part 2 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 16 - "Over the Air-Waves" Part 2
The Yacht off shore is explored while Kalani and Angel leave for an unexpected detour
Come back Monday December 6th for Part 3.

episodes.title: Chapter 16 - Over the Air-Waves - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 16 - "Over the Air-Waves" Part 1
The beach is an inviting place...

episodes.title: Chapter 15 - Desperate Times - Part 3 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 15 - "Desperate Times" Part 3
Michael, Kelly, and Pegs explore their new surroundings.
Come back Monday November 15th for Chapter 16.

episodes.title: Chapter 15 - Desperate Times - Part 2 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 15 - "Desperate Times" Part 2
Michael, Kelly, and Pegs embark south.
Come back Monday November 1st for Part 3.

episodes.title: Chapter 15 - Desperate Times - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 15 - "Desperate Times" Part 1
Food, water, and tempers run short as the survivors look to find a new place to live.
Come back Monday October 25th for Part 2!

episodes.title: Chapter 14 - Out of the Ashes - Part 3 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 14 - "Out of the Ashes" Part 3
Everyone says their last goodbyes.
Come back Monday October 18th for Chapter 15!

episodes.title: Chapter 14 - Out of the Ashes - Part 2 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 14 - "Out of the Ashes" Part 2
Saul's need for medical attention comes to a head as Burt assembles a team to get the bullet out of him.
Come back October 4th for Part 3!

episodes.title: Chapter 14 - Out of the Ashes - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 14 - "Out of the Ashes" Part 1
The fallout from the war comes to the surface!
Come back September 27th for Part 2!

episodes.title: Chapter 13 - Separate Dying Embers - Part 3 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 13 - "Separate Dying Embers" Part 3
The war continues both in and outside the tower.
Come back September 20th for Chapter 14!

episodes.title: Chapter 13 - Separate Dying Embers - Part 2 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 13 - "Separate Dying Embers" Part 2
A Clue left behind sparks a new hope for the survivors.
Come back September 6th for Part 3!

episodes.title: Chapter 13 - Separate Dying Embers - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 13 - "Separate Dying Embers" Part 1
The survivors are trapped in their fortress, trying to find a way out.
Come back August 30th for Part 2!

episodes.description:
Season 1 Recap Part 2
Part 2 of the Season 1 Recap of "We're Alive"
Come back August 23rd 2010 for the Season 2 of We're Alive!

episodes.description:
Season 1 Recap Part 1
Part 1 of the Season 1 Recap of "We're Alive"

episodes.title: Chapter 12 - The War - Part 4 of 4
episodes.description:
Chapter 12 - "The War" Part 4
The Season 1 Finale of "We're Alive".
Come back August 2010 for the Season 2 of We're Alive!

episodes.title: Chapter 12 - The War - Part 3 of 4
episodes.description:
Chapter 12 - "The War" Part 3
The Mallers continue to attack the tower.
Come back Monday, April 19th for the final part of the Season Finale!

episodes.title: Chapter 12 - The War - Part 2 of 4
episodes.description:
Chapter 12 - "The War" Part 2
The Mallers attack the tower.
Come back Monday, April 12th for part 3 of the Season Finale!

episodes.title: Chapter 12 - The War - Part 1 of 4
episodes.description:
Chapter 12 - "The War" Part 1
The Tower stands, alone and surrounded.
Come back Monday, April 5th for part 2 of the Season Finale!

episodes.title: Chapter 11 - R&R - Part 3 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 11 - "Rest and Recreation" Part 3
In the shadow of disaster, the tower takes some well needed Rest and Rehabilitation.
Come back Monday, March 29th for the start of the 4 Part Season Finale!

episodes.title: Chapter 11 - R&R - Part 2 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 11 - "Rest and Recreation" Part 2
The survivors search out the thief as Kalani describes his experience at the other tower.
Come back Monday, March 15th for Part 3!

episodes.title: Chapter 11 - R&R - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 11 - "Rest and Recreation" Part 1
The rescue team returns to the tower.
Come back Monday, March 8th for Part 2!

episodes.title: Chapter 10 - Purgatory - Part 3 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 10 - "Purgatory" Part 3
The fires are lit in the center of the arena, as the guards return to the prisoners.
Come back Monday, March 1st for Chapter 11!

episodes.title: Chapter 10 - Purgatory - Part 2 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 10 - "Purgatory" Part 2
Behind enemy lines, the team struggles to keep optimism and regain control in what is a hopeless situation.
Come back Monday, February 15th for Part 3!

episodes.title: Chapter 10 - Purgatory - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 10 - "Purgatory" Part 1
Deep inside the arena our team gets a first hand look at what goes on inside the lair.
Come back Monday, February 8th for Part 2!

episodes.title: Chapter 9 - The Road to Living Death - Part 3 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 9 - "The Road to Living Death" Part 3
Trapped, with few options, the remainder of the recon team set out to make up for the numerous mistakes made in the mission and head into the home of the zombies.
Come back Monday, February 1st for Chapter 10!

episodes.title: Chapter 9 - The Road to Living Death - Part 2 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 9 - "The Road to Living Death" Part 2
The recon group digs in deep as they approach the source of the trackers.
Come back Monday, January 18th for Part 3!

episodes.title: Chapter 9 - The Road to Living Death - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 9 - "The Road to Living Death" Part 1
The mission is continued as planned. The path is littered with obstacles and zombies along the way, but someone or something very peculiar has survived.
Come back Monday, January 11th for Part 2!

episodes.title: Chapter 8 - Where Do You Go When You Sleep? - Part 3 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 8 - "Where Do You Go When You Sleep?" Part 3
The water pumping station reveals something that the survivors would never have expected. Everything starts to fall apart soon after.
Come back Monday, December 28th for Chapter 9!

episodes.title: Chapter 8 - Where Do You Go When You Sleep? - Part 2 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 8 - "Where Do You Go When You Sleep?" Part 2
Utilities start to fail and stage 2 of Michael's plan is underway, and decide to head towards the water pumping plant.
Come back Monday, December 14th for Part 3!

episodes.title: Chapter 8 - Where Do You Go When You Sleep? - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 8 - "Where Do You Go When You Sleep?" Part 1
Uninvited visitors show up and stir up problems at the tower.
Come back Monday, December 7th for Part 2! We're taking a week off for Thanksgiving.

episodes.title: Chapter 7 - Blood Sweat and Fears - Part 3 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 7 - "Blood Sweat and Fears" Part 3
Michael's idea of tagging the zombies is underway with unforeseen consequences.
Come back Monday, November 23rd for Chapter 8!

episodes.title: Chapter 7 - Blood Sweat and Fears - Part 2 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 7 - "Blood Sweat and Fears" Part 2
The test continues and the team discovers what happens with their "bait". The come up with a plan to find out where the zombies are all coming from.
Come back next Monday, November 9th for Part 3!

episodes.title: Chapter 7 - Blood Sweat and Fears - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 7 - "Blood Sweat and Fears" Part 1
A new plan encourages the group to start developing bait for the zombies. Lizzy devises a plan to go to another rooftop to test her theory.
Come back next Monday, November 2nd for Part 2!

episodes.title: Chapter 6 - The Remains of Eastern Bay - Part 3 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 6 - "The Remains of Eastern Bay" Part 3
Saul is discovered as he makes radio contact with the tower. An onslaught of mallers and zombies stalk him as he tries to escape.
Come back next Monday, October 26th for Chapter 7!

episodes.title: Chapter 6 - The Remains of Eastern Bay - Part 2 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 6 - "The Remains of Eastern Bay" Part 2
A compromise is made and our team separates. Saul follows the Mallers back to their home to find out some disturbing information.
Come back next Monday, October 12th for part 3!

episodes.title: Chapter 6 - The Remains of Eastern Bay - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 6 - "The Remains of Eastern Bay" Part 1
The fuel team heads back to the tower with the fuel truck. A couple of other suspicious survivors come in  contact with Burt, Lizzy and Saul.
Come back next Monday, October 5th for part 2!

episodes.title: Chapter 5 - Lady and the Tink - Part 3 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 5 - "Lady and the Tink" Part 3
Burt and Lizzy return to the fuel depot to find out what happened to Saul.
Come back in two weeks, Monday, September 28th for Chapter 6, The Remains of Eastern Bay!

episodes.title: Chapter 5 - Lady and the Tink - Part 2 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 5 - "Lady and the Tink" Part 2
Our small detachment of survivors venture to the refueling station. They decide to make a detour to see if Saul's girl survived the attacks.
Come back next Monday, September 14th for The Next Part!

episodes.title: Chapter 5 - Lady and the Tink - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 5 - "Lady and the Tink" Part 1
Saul, Lizzy and Burt tell the tale of their mission to the refueling station. Along the way they find remnants of a huge battle.
Come back here next Monday, September 7th for The Next Part!

episodes.title: Chapter 4 - Rules and Regulations - Part 3 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 4 - "Rules and Regulations" Part 3
The events of the past have spurred a new directive: to document everything that happens in a journal. Problems is the tower lead to a small scale revolt.
Come back here next Monday, August 31st for The Next Chapter!

episodes.title: Chapter 4 - Rules and Regulations - Part 2 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 4 - "Rules and Regulations" Part 2
The goals and jobs given to the survivors are starting to be implemented. One of the survivors becomes suddenly ill.
Come back here next Monday, August 17th for The Next Chapter!

episodes.title: Chapter 4 - Rules and Regulations - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 4 - "Rules and Regulations" Part 1
The survivors move to retake the tower floor by floor. Dissension starts to grow as Michael establishes a new set of rules for the apartment building.
Come back here next Monday, August 10th for The Next Chapter!

episodes.title: Chapter 3 - The New Arrivals - Part 3 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 3 - "The New Arrivals" Part 3
Burt, Saul, and Angel meet with Michael and return to the tower to find it under siege. Using supplies from Burt's secret stash, they turn the tides and go to find their friends inside.
Come back here next Monday, August 3rd for The Next Chapter!

episodes.title: Chapter 3 - The New Arrivals - Part 2 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 3 - "The New Arrivals" Part 2
A slip-up causes the survivors of the tower to be noticed. Michael scrambles to keep everyone safe while Saul and Angel discover a dying old man, Burt, out amongst the ruins.
Come back here next Monday, July 20th for The Next Chapter!

episodes.title: Chapter 3 - The New Arrivals - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 3 - "The New Arrivals" Part 1
Saul and Angel are scavenging for supplies, but are coming up short. A new group of survivors are drawn to Peg's "We're Alive" sign hanging outside the tower.
Come back here next Monday, July 13th for The Next Chapter!

episodes.title: Chapter 2 - The Two Things - Part 3 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 2 - "The Two Things" Part 3
Lizzy, Riley, and Datu are trained to shoot. Pegs struggles to find a purpose as she refuses to use a gun. The other soldiers prepare the hummer for recon missions.
Come back here next Monday, July 6th for The Next Chapter!

episodes.title: Chapter 2 - The Two Things - Part 2 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 2 - "The Two Things" Part 2
Access to the lobby has been lost and needs to be sealed in case more come to the tower for refuge. The rest search the rooms for food and supplies, but find something else living in the tower.
Come back here next Monday, June 22nd for part 3!

episodes.title: Chapter 2 - The Two Things - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 2 - "The Two Things" Part 1
The tower lobby is secured, but only for so long. Survivors on the outside try to find refuge in the tower, attracting threats to their front door.
Come back here next Monday, June 15th for part 2!

episodes.title: Chapter 1 - It Begins - Part 3 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 1 - "It Begins" Part 3
The group searches the apartment building, finding surprises around every corner. Datu, a Filipino maintenance man, describes what happened to the other people in the tower.

episodes.title: Chapter 1 - It Begins - Part 2 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 1 - "It Begins" Part 2
Michael, Angel, and Saul travel through downtown LA. They find two female survivors, Riley and Pegs on the roof of a shop, then continue toward an apartment building to hold up in.

episodes.title: Chapter 1 - It Begins - Part 1 of 3
episodes.description:
Chapter 1 - "It Begins" Part 1
The story of survival begins. Michael Cross, 27, watches people attack each other on the way to his Army Reserve Duty station.  The situation starts to unravel as he meets up with the other two Soldiers, Saul Tink and Angel Tunudo.
